skillTree.localised_description: The Witch Hunter levels his finger across the battlefield and accuses one of the enemy of arch-heresy!
A Witch Hunter is a stern, grim figure, that can rarely be rattled despite the horrors he faces.

attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

skillTree.localised_description: When attacking larger abominations, the Witch Hunter has the accoutrements to bring such beasts down.
The Witch Hunter keeps many blessed relics on his person to protect him from magical attack.
Those who bear the Mark of Hysh are practitioners of the magical Lore of Light, and the bane of Chaos, for they are able to control and manipulate the White Wind of Magic.
The relentless drive and fury of the Hammer, harnessed for the protection of this ward’s bearer.
Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Heroes of the same type

skillTree.localised_description: Never back down, and never step out of line, for every Imperial order is law.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit does not suffer any form of leadership loss and will never rout.

skillTree.localised_description: Root out and destroy Greenskins, the servants of Chaos, and those who use corrupt magic, wherever they may hide.

effects.description:
Enemy Winds of Magic power reserve: -5 per turn
	(enemy armies in local province)

Vigour loss reduction: -33% against all Chaos, Norsca, Daemons and Greenskin factions
	(Hero's army)

skillTree.localised_description: When tracking one's prey, best stick to the light of the moon.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit can move hidden in any terrain.

skillTree.localised_description: Move in the shadows to serve the light.

related_attributes.bullet_text: This unit remains hidden while firing.

skillTree.localised_description: Their only saviour shall be the stake…

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: The Imperial Witch Hunters have attended many funerals… mostly for their own victims.

effects.description: Hero action cost: -20% for Witch Hunters

skillTree.localised_description: A drawn blade should not be put away until slaked in blood.
This being fights dirty, no honour system applies here!
"Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"
The Witch Hunter’s thrice-blessed silver bullets are the final judgement of the damned.
Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.
Always on the lookout for an opening or advantage in battle - somewhere to put the knife in…
The harder they hit, the more they commit, the easier it is to strike back.
"The enemy's fear; their blood spilt in the mud – these are the things that sustain me."
Never trap this one, when cornered they have nothing left to lose.
"I am not here to inspire, I am here to kill - come let us draw blades together!"

effects.description: Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 3%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 8%
Scavenge action: Income from post-battle loot is increased by an additional 15%

skillTree.localised_description: The locals take notice and will be inspired or frightened into action.

effects.description: Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 1
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 2
Cleanse Corruption action: Corruption is reduced by an additional 3

skillTree.localised_description: They cannot stop what they cannot see.

effects.description: Damage Walls action: 1 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 2 additional wall breaches
Damage Walls action: 3 additional wall breaches

skillTree.localised_description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.
To sow discord and confuse the enemy, sending them down the wrong route or befuddling their senses.

effects.description: Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -3%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -8%
Block Army action: Movement range is modified by an additional -15%

skillTree.localised_description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

attributes.bullet_text: This unit provides a leadership bonus to nearby allies. Units within range of both the Lord's aura and an encouraging unit will receive the larger of the two bonuses.
This unit can hide in forests until enemy units get too close.
The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
This unit can fire while on the move.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: A regal air? Let's see how long that lasts.
"The smallfolk should be thankful - without us, who would they work for?"

effects.description:
Construction time: -25% for all buildings
	(local region)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Franz has put his trust in this man; pray he does not let him down!
"If it's got a scent and footprints, I'll find it. Also, it helps if it's absolutely huge and can be spotted a league away."
The thrill of the chase, the tremor as the quarry is cornered, the ecstasy of the kill. These are the things that matter.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

related_attributes.bullet_text: Speed and combat penalties caused by terrain are ignored by this unit.
This unit can deploy outside the deployment zone.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description: Greatly reduced chance of being detected while in ambush stance

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Having a modicum of resolve is useful in a world that continually tests it.

related_attributes.bullet_text: The unit is immune to psychological attacks (Fear & Terror).
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any large attacker.
When bracing, this unit negates the charge bonus of any attacker.

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.
Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.
If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.
Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.
If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.
This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

effects.description:
Casualty replenishment rate: +5%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.localised_description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

effects.description:
Missile strength: +10% for units
	(all units in army)
